title: What is the next possession that people will share through a mobile app? - Quora

response.answer_text: As we all know that, this is an era of globalization and technology plays a big role in modern times. It is because of technology, we can keep ourselves up to date with all the current issues. It won't be wrong in analyzing that there is wide scope for the young generation if they opt to become a mobile app developers as this is the industry which will definitely give growth to them.
